nextSteps.title: What happens next?
nextSteps.description: After submitting your pre-registration, you'll receive a confirmation email. When we confirm the track and dates, we'll send you all the information to complete your official registration. Pre-registered teams will have priority for spots.

items.question: How many riders can a team have?
items.answer: Each team can have a minimum of 4 and a maximum of 8 riders. Additionally, you can register up to 4 staff members (mechanics, coordinators, support). All riders must be registered before the registration deadline.

items.question: Do I need a racing license?
items.answer: No racing license is required. The organization will provide liability insurance for all participants during the event.

items.question: Can I participate without a team?
items.answer: If you don't have a team, mention it in the comments section of the form. We'll try to connect you with other riders looking for teammates.

items.question: What's included in the registration?
items.answer: Registration includes track access for the entire team, transponder, official timing, pit/paddock access, briefing and technical inspections, and trophies for the podium.

items.question: Is there a lap limit per rider?
items.answer: Yes, there will be a maximum number of continuous stints per rider to ensure safety and team spirit. Specific details will be communicated in the sporting regulations.
